Miner School of Computer and Information SciencesUniversity of Massachusetts LowellResearch Group:PeARL: Persistent Autonomy and Robot Learning lab [Website]413 Dandeneau Hall, North CampusProspective students: I look for motivated and experienced graduate students (Ph.D. and M.Sc.) with an interest and background in Robot Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Imitation Learning, and Learning from Demonstration.
